message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you our premium product at a special price of $10000. This is a great deal considering its value and quality. Let me know if you're interested!

Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the quality of your product. Considering my budget, I would like to propose a price of $9000. I believe this is a fair offer and hope we can make a deal.

Hi Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but the product's value justifies a higher price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it for $9500. This is my final offer before considering other buyers. Let me know if this works for you!
